In addition, Andriy is serving as NA/East2 BU delivery partner in Ukraine.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":53592,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cb5b7895-b36a-44f7-96c0-286f49413af7/4cap.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cb5b7895-b36a-44f7-96c0-286f49413af7/4cap.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"4cap.PNG\",\"name\":\"4cap.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cb5b7895-b36a-44f7-96c0-286f49413af7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":443,\"height\":108},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sergiy Shkurupiy\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", Senior Director, Software Engineering, Head of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Ukraine East Delivery Office\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Sergiy started his career at EPAM back in 2008 as the Head of the Kharkiv office. Under his supervision, the location grew to 2000+ people and in 2019 was merged with the Dnipro office. Now EPAM Ukraine East Delivery Office is the second largest EPAM Ukraine location with strong expertise in Java, JavaScript, Hybris, .NET, AEM, Cloud, BI, DevOps, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":51074,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e8e16f7-0f7e-4973-9e6e-c6bc4aa36317/5cap.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e8e16f7-0f7e-4973-9e6e-c6bc4aa36317/5cap.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"5cap.PNG\",\"name\":\"5cap.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3e8e16f7-0f7e-4973-9e6e-c6bc4aa36317\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":444,\"height\":118},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Artem Nikutov\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", Senior Software Engineering Manager, Head of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Dnipro\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Artem has been running the Dnipro office for over 12 years. Since the very first day, he has been focused on successful delivery, effective motivation processes, the professional development of Dnipro managers, and the growth of the team. During the years Artem along with the colleagues was involved in a number of projects for major EPAM clients such as Canadian Tire Corp, Ticketmaster, Refinitiv, Accellion, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":53428,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/410e81a9-9449-4954-8c14-4360e0cc46e1/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/410e81a9-9449-4954-8c14-4360e0cc46e1/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"410e81a9-9449-4954-8c14-4360e0cc46e1\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":444,\"height\":108},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sergii Garashchuk\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", Senior Director, Head of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UA South Delivery Office\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Sergii has over 15 years of total IT experience in various technical and management roles and domains focusing on technology leadership, large-scale delivery/account management and business development.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
